'''15w35b''' is the fifteenth [[snapshot]] for [[Java Edition 1.9]], released on August 24, 2015<ref>https://web.archive.org/web/0/https://www.mojang.com/2015/08/minecraft-snapshot-15w35a/</ref> to fix various bugs, including problems with zombie AI being disabled, block rendering in the End, and End crystals respawning.

== Changes ==
=== Mobs ===
'''[[Zombie]]'''
* Fixed AI being disabled.<ref>https://bugs.mojang.com/browse/MC-87193</ref><ref>{{tweet|Dinnerbone|635839698481598464|Snapshot 15w35b has been released to fix the zombie bug.|August 24, 2015}}</ref>
** Zombies spawned during [[15w35a]] still have no AI.
